items.prompt: I’m an infrastructure engineer evaluating cloud migration options. Context: We’re moving from on-prem to the cloud for a fintech backend. Output: Compare AWS, GCP, and Azure for scalability, pricing, compliance, and developer tooling. Include citations.
items.superPrompt: I’m an infrastructure engineer evaluating cloud migration options. Context: We’re moving from on-prem to the cloud for a fintech backend. Output: Compare AWS, GCP, and Azure for scalability, pricing, compliance, and developer tooling. Include citations.

items.prompt: I’m building a real-time collaboration tool. Context: We need low-latency and scalability. Output: Compare top frameworks (e.g., SignalR, Socket.io, WebRTC) with use cases, pros/cons, and current usage by other SaaS companies. Include sources.
items.superPrompt: I’m building a real-time collaboration tool. Context: We need low-latency and scalability. Output: Compare top frameworks (e.g., SignalR, Socket.io, WebRTC) with use cases, pros/cons, and current usage by other SaaS companies. Include sources.

items.prompt: Benchmark the top observability tools. Context: We want to move from basic logging to full-stack monitoring. Output: Create a comparison table of features, pricing, integrations for Datadog, New Relic, Prometheus, and OpenTelemetry. Include sources.
items.superPrompt: Benchmark the top observability tools. Context: We want to move from basic logging to full-stack monitoring. Output: Create a comparison table of features, pricing, integrations for Datadog, New Relic, Prometheus, and OpenTelemetry. Include sources.

items.prompt: I’m researching AI/ML adoption in logistics systems. Context: Our company is considering integrating predictive routing. Output: A 5-paragraph summary on current trends, vendors, and implementation patterns. Include citations and links.
items.superPrompt: I’m researching AI/ML adoption in logistics systems. Context: Our company is considering integrating predictive routing. Output: A 5-paragraph summary on current trends, vendors, and implementation patterns. Include citations and links.

items.prompt: Research best practices for GDPR/CCPA compliance so we can help kick off discussions with our legal team. Context: Our app stores sensitive user data in the EU and US. Output: A compliance checklist with citations, sorted by regulation. Include links to documentation and regulations.
items.superPrompt: Research best practices for GDPR/CCPA compliance so we can help kick off discussions with our legal team. Context: Our app stores sensitive user data in the EU and US. Output: A compliance checklist with citations, sorted by regulation. Include links to documentation and regulations.

items.prompt: I’ve drafted a technical design document for [insert project or feature]. Review it for clarity, architectural soundness, and completeness. Highlight any missing considerations or questions reviewers may raise.
items.superPrompt: I’ve drafted a technical design document for {{ field1 || insert project or feature}}. Review it for clarity, architectural soundness, and completeness. Highlight any missing considerations or questions reviewers may raise.

items.prompt: I need to document how this internal API works for other developers. Here’s the relevant code, schema, and usage examples: [insert materials]. Create clear documentation including endpoints, input/output formats, and expected behavior.
items.superPrompt: I need to document how this internal API works for other developers. Here’s the relevant code, schema, and usage examples: {{ field1 || insert materials}}. Create clear documentation including endpoints, input/output formats, and expected behavior.

items.prompt: I need to create a runbook for on-call engineers supporting [insert system]. Draft one that includes sections for system overview, common alerts, diagnostic steps, and escalation procedures.
items.superPrompt: I need to create a runbook for on-call engineers supporting {{ field1 || insert system}}. Draft one that includes sections for system overview, common alerts, diagnostic steps, and escalation procedures.

items.use_case: Draft onboarding guide for new hires
items.prompt: I need to write an onboarding guide for new engineers joining [insert team]. Create a draft with sections for required tools, access setup, codebase overview, and first tasks. Make it suitable for self-service onboarding.
items.superPrompt: I need to write an onboarding guide for new engineers joining {{ field1 || insert team}}. Create a draft with sections for required tools, access setup, codebase overview, and first tasks. Make it suitable for self-service onboarding.

items.prompt: Based on this engineering spec for [insert task or feature], write a JIRA ticket that includes the problem statement, context, goals, acceptance criteria, and technical notes for implementation.
items.superPrompt: Based on this engineering spec for {{ field1 || insert task or feature}}, write a JIRA ticket that includes the problem statement, context, goals, acceptance criteria, and technical notes for implementation.

items.prompt: A system in production is intermittently failing, and we’re struggling to isolate the root cause. Based on the following logs, metrics, and recent changes: [insert context], help identify the most likely causes and suggest next steps for mitigation.
items.superPrompt: A system in production is intermittently failing, and we’re struggling to isolate the root cause. Based on the following logs, metrics, and recent changes: {{ field1 || insert context}}, help identify the most likely causes and suggest next steps for mitigation.

items.prompt: Our service is experiencing latency and degraded performance during peak usage. Here are metrics, logs, and relevant traces: [insert context]. Help identify the bottlenecks and recommend specific optimizations.
items.superPrompt: Our service is experiencing latency and degraded performance during peak usage. Here are metrics, logs, and relevant traces: {{ field1 || insert context}}. Help identify the bottlenecks and recommend specific optimizations.

items.prompt: A critical data pipeline failed in yesterday’s run. Here are the logs, data volume trends, and error outputs: [insert context]. Analyze what likely went wrong and provide recommendations to prevent recurrence.
items.superPrompt: A critical data pipeline failed in yesterday’s run. Here are the logs, data volume trends, and error outputs: {{ field1 || insert context}}. Analyze what likely went wrong and provide recommendations to prevent recurrence.

items.prompt: We currently use [insert tools] for monitoring [insert service]. Review our observability setup and suggest improvements across metrics, logging, alerting, and dashboards to improve issue detection and debugging.
items.superPrompt: We currently use {{ field1 || insert tools}} for monitoring {{ field2 || insert service}}. Review our observability setup and suggest improvements across metrics, logging, alerting, and dashboards to improve issue detection and debugging.

items.prompt: We’re preparing test cases for [insert feature/system]. Brainstorm potential edge cases and failure scenarios that may not be covered by standard testing, including unusual user inputs, system state changes, and concurrency issues.
items.superPrompt: We’re preparing test cases for {{ field1 || insert feature/system}}. Brainstorm potential edge cases and failure scenarios that may not be covered by standard testing, including unusual user inputs, system state changes, and concurrency issues.

items.use_case: Identify trends in product usage logs
items.prompt: Analyze this CSV of product usage logs. Context: We want to identify usage trends over time and across user segments. Output: Summary stats + line or bar charts highlighting key trends.
items.superPrompt: Analyze this CSV of product usage logs. Context: We want to identify usage trends over time and across user segments. Output: Summary stats + line or bar charts highlighting key trends.

items.use_case: Visualize system error rates over time
items.prompt: Plot error rates over time from this dataset. Context: It contains application logs from the last month. Output: A time-series chart with callouts for error spikes and a short interpretation.
items.superPrompt: Plot error rates over time from this dataset. Context: It contains application logs from the last month. Output: A time-series chart with callouts for error spikes and a short interpretation.

items.prompt: Analyze this set of performance test results. Context: It compares two versions of our backend service. Output: Side-by-side comparison charts + text summary of improvements or regressions.
items.superPrompt: Analyze this set of performance test results. Context: It compares two versions of our backend service. Output: Side-by-side comparison charts + text summary of improvements or regressions.

items.prompt: Analyze this bug report dataset. Context: Each row includes severity, frequency, and affected users. Output: A prioritized list of top bugs with charts showing frequency vs. severity.
items.superPrompt: Analyze this bug report dataset. Context: Each row includes severity, frequency, and affected users. Output: A prioritized list of top bugs with charts showing frequency vs. severity.

items.prompt: Summarize this user feedback CSV. Context: It includes ratings and open text responses from a recent survey. Output: Key themes, sentiment scores, and charts showing distribution of ratings.
items.superPrompt: Summarize this user feedback CSV. Context: It includes ratings and open text responses from a recent survey. Output: Key themes, sentiment scores, and charts showing distribution of ratings.

items.prompt: I need to visualize the architecture of [insert system or service]. Generate a component diagram showing key services, data flows, and third-party integrations. Use clear labels and group components logically.
items.superPrompt: I need to visualize the architecture of {{ field1 || insert system or service}}. Generate a component diagram showing key services, data flows, and third-party integrations. Use clear labels and group components logically.

items.prompt: Create an image of the system architecture. Context: It’s a microservices-based e-commerce platform with services for payments, catalog, and user profiles. Output: Diagram with labeled services and data flow arrows.
items.superPrompt: Create an image of the system architecture. Context: It’s a microservices-based e-commerce platform with services for payments, catalog, and user profiles. Output: Diagram with labeled services and data flow arrows.

items.prompt: Create an image that explains our CI/CD process. Context: This is for a presentation to business stakeholders. Output: Diagram showing dev → build → test → deploy steps with basic icons and short descriptions.
items.superPrompt: Create an image that explains our CI/CD process. Context: This is for a presentation to business stakeholders. Output: Diagram showing dev → build → test → deploy steps with basic icons and short descriptions.

items.use_case: Model data flow in ML pipeline
items.prompt: Create an image showing data flow in a machine learning pipeline. Context: We collect raw user data, clean it, train models, and serve predictions. Output: A labeled flowchart from raw data to inference.
items.superPrompt: Create an image showing data flow in a machine learning pipeline. Context: We collect raw user data, clean it, train models, and serve predictions. Output: A labeled flowchart from raw data to inference.

items.prompt: Create a customer journey map through our mobile banking app. Context: Steps include onboarding, account linking, transactions, and support. Output: A visual flowchart with steps, screens, and decision points.
items.superPrompt: Create a customer journey map through our mobile banking app. Context: Steps include onboarding, account linking, transactions, and support. Output: A visual flowchart with steps, screens, and decision points.
